HERO.TITLE: Transform Customer Conversations
HERO.DESCRIPTION: In today's fast-paced digital landscape, every second counts. Our AI chatbots deliver instant, 24/7 personalized supportâ€”answering questions and guiding users to the right services.

USE_CASES.TITLE: Explore use cases from our official collection
USE_CASES.DESCRIPTION: Learn how Manus handles real-world tasks through step-by-step replays.

SCREENS.SUBTITLE: Screens
SCREENS.TITLE: Flexible Display, Seamless Experience
SCREENS.DESCRIPTION: For seamless customer support, the AI assistant is readily available on mobile devices and can be integrated directly onto your current website for easy access.

TASK_AUTOMATION_CONTENT.TITLE: Automated Task Execution
TASK_AUTOMATION_CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Goes beyond simple answers to actively perform tasks like filling out forms, scheduling appointments, and completing multi-step service requests directly for customers.
TASK_AUTOMATION_CONTENT.CARD1_DESCRIPTION: Automatically fills out complex registration or application forms.
TASK_AUTOMATION_CONTENT.CARD2_DESCRIPTION: Schedules, reschedules, and cancels appointments across calendars.

COMMUNICATION_CONTENT.TITLE: Rich & Multimodal Communication
COMMUNICATION_CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Delivers information and assistance in the most effective format, combining text with images, tables, charts, and other visual elements for maximum clarity and engagement.
COMMUNICATION_CONTENT.CARD1_DESCRIPTION: Generates interactive charts and tables to explain complex data.
COMMUNICATION_CONTENT.CARD2_DESCRIPTION: Provides step-by-step instructions with images and diagrams.

REASONING_CONTENT.TITLE: Advanced Reasoning & Planning
REASONING_CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Unlike basic retrieval systems, the AI analyzes complex queries, synthesizes information from various sources, and plans multi-step interactions to provide sophisticated support.
REASONING_CONTENT.CARD1_DESCRIPTION: Organizes and executes a series of dependent actions to accomplish a larger, composite goal.
REASONING_CONTENT.CARD2_DESCRIPTION: Synthesizes information to offer solutions for multifaceted challenges.

UNDERSTANDING_CONTENT.TITLE: Deep Contextual Understanding
UNDERSTANDING_CONTENT.DESCRIPTION: Maintains full awareness of the conversation history and relevant customer information, ensuring responses are always personalized, accurate, and highly relevant to the situation.
UNDERSTANDING_CONTENT.CARD1_DESCRIPTION: Remembers previous interactions to provide seamless, ongoing support.
UNDERSTANDING_CONTENT.CARD2_DESCRIPTION: Adjusts its course of action based on new information in the conversation.
